articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Aston Martin reveals major F1 upgrades for Canadian GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: The scale of Aston Martin's upgrades for Formula 1's Canadian Grand Prix has been revealed, with a major overhaul of its sidepods and floor.
articles.content:
The team has so far been quite conservative with its developments of the AMR23, with many of its main rivals having unleashed major changes to their 2023 challengers.
But just a fortnight after Fern… [+1922 chars]

articles.author: Tyrell Feaster, Reuters
articles.title: PGA Tour and LIV Golf alliance 'will be investigated by the US Justice Department' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Justice Department had previously opened a probe into the PGA Tour's strategies for trying to keep its players from defecting to LIV, which was writing supersized paychecks.
articles.content:
The US Justice Department will review the PGA Tour's plan to merge with Saudi-backed LIV Golf Tour to determine if the move violates antitrust law, according to The Wall Street Journal.
The PGA Tour… [+11070 chars]

articles.title: He Loved Bowling Here! | Every Glenn McGrath Wicket in 2001 & 2005 | Lord's - Lord's Cricket Ground
articles.description: McGrath was a master at Lord's! His 8 wickets in 2001 and 9 wickets in 2005 both led Australia to victory.Subscribe to Lord's: http://www.youtube.com/user/Lo...
